title: Quickie: Bill Burr, Rough N Rowdy and Why Gambling Is Being Legalized
description:
Bill Burr calls in to make his prediction in the Pig vs Punk and Pride vs Prejudice matches in #RnR4, if he would trade in comedy to be a drummer and why gambling is being legalized


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/kfcr
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
